mapper.select:
select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT 1)) AS rowNum ,b.client_name ,a.prod_name ,a.lab_no ,c.member_nm as managerName ,a.reg_date ,a.manager_id ,a.client_id ,a.recipe_id ,dbo.getCommonName('prod_type', a.prod_type ) as prod_type from tb_recipe_mst a left outer join tb_client_mst b on b.client_id = a.client_id inner join tb_users c on c.user_id = a.manager_id where 1=1
and a.prod_name like '%' + #{prodName} + '%'
and a.lab_no like '%' + #{labNo} + '%'
AND c.member_nm LIKE '%' + #{managerName} + '%'
order by a.reg_date desc

select b.client_name ,a.prod_name ,a.lab_no ,c.member_nm as managerName ,a.reg_date ,a.manager_id ,a.client_id ,a.recipe_id ,a.prod_type from tb_recipe_mst a left outer join tb_client_mst b on b.client_id = a.client_id inner join tb_users c on c.user_id = a.manager_id where a.recipe_id = #{recipeId}

select a.phase ,a.item_cd ,a.item_name ,a.content ,a.in_price ,(a.content*a.in_price*0.01*0.001) as unitPrice ,a.recipe_id from ( select a.phase ,a.item_cd ,b.item_name ,a.content ,b.in_price ,a.recipe_id from tb_recipe_detail a inner join tb_item_mst b on b.item_cd = a.item_cd where a.recipe_id = #{recipeId} union all select a.phase ,a.item_cd ,b.material_name ,a.content ,b.in_price ,a.recipe_id from tb_recipe_detail a inner join tb_new_material_mst b on b.new_material_cd = a.item_cd where a.recipe_id = #{recipeId} ) a
mapper.insert: insert into tb_recipe_detail (recipe_id, item_cd, phase, content, reg_id, upd_id) values (#{recipeId}, #{itemCd}, #{phase}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select a.prodName ,a.prodTypeName ,isnull(b.enProd_type_name, '') as enProdTypeName from ( select a.prod_Name as prodName ,dbo.getCommonName('prod_type', a.prod_type) as prodTypeName from tb_recipe_mst a where recipe_id = #{recipeId} ) a left outer join tb_product_type b on (b.prod_type_name = a.prodTypeName or b.enProd_type_name = a.prodTypeName)

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT 1)) AS rowNum ,a.kr_Ingredient_name ,a.en_Ingredient_name ,a.cn_Ingredient_name ,a.ingredient_code ,sum(a.content) as content ,a.reference ,a.cas_no ,a.functionName from ( select c.kr_Ingredient_name ,c.en_Ingredient_name ,c.cn_Ingredient_name ,b.ingredient_code ,b.in_content*a.content*0.01 as content ,'ICID' as reference ,c.cas_no ,dbo.getCommonName('fn_cd', c.function_cd) as functionName from tb_recipe_detail a inner join tb_material_mapping b on b.item_cd = a.item_cd inner join tb_ingredient_mst c on c.Ingredient_code = b.ingredient_code where a.recipe_id = #{recipeId} union all select b.kr_Ingredient_name ,b.en_Ingredient_name ,b.cn_Ingredient_name ,b.ingredient_code ,a.in_content*a.content*0.01 as content ,'ICID' as reference ,b.cas_no ,dbo.getCommonName('fn_cd', b.function_cd) as functionName from ( select a.Ingredient_code ,b.item_cd ,b.content ,a.in_content ,a.out_content from tb_new_material_detail a inner join ( select b.new_material_cd as item_cd ,a.content ,a.recipe_id from tb_recipe_detail a inner join tb_new_material_mst b on b.new_material_cd = a.item_cd inner join tb_new_material_detail c on c.new_material_cd = b.new_material_cd where recipe_id = #{recipeId} ) b on a.new_material_cd = b.item_cd ) a inner join tb_ingredient_mst b on b.Ingredient_code = a.Ingredient_code ) a group by a.kr_Ingredient_name ,a.en_Ingredient_name ,a.cn_Ingredient_name ,a.ingredient_code ,a.reference ,a.cas_no ,a.functionName order by content desc

select DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY a.content desc, a.item_cd) AS rowNum ,a.kr_Ingredient_name ,a.en_Ingredient_name ,a.cn_Ingredient_name ,a.ingredient_code ,a.content ,a.composition ,a.InFormula ,reference ,a.cas_no ,dbo.getCommonName('fn_cd', a.function_cd) as functionName ,a.item_cd from ( select c.kr_Ingredient_name ,c.en_Ingredient_name ,c.cn_Ingredient_name ,b.ingredient_code ,sum(a.content) as content ,sum(b.out_content) as composition ,sum(b.out_content*a.content*0.01) as InFormula ,'ICID' as reference ,c.cas_no ,c.function_cd -- ,dbo.getCommonName('fn_cd', c.function_cd) as functionName ,a.item_cd from tb_recipe_detail a inner join tb_material_mapping b on b.item_cd = a.item_cd inner join tb_ingredient_mst c on c.Ingredient_code = b.ingredient_code where a.recipe_id = #{recipeId} group by c.kr_Ingredient_name ,c.en_Ingredient_name ,c.cn_Ingredient_name ,b.ingredient_code ,c.cas_no ,c.function_cd ,a.item_cd union all select b.kr_Ingredient_name ,b.en_Ingredient_name ,b.cn_Ingredient_name ,b.ingredient_code ,sum(a.content) as content ,sum(a.out_content) as composition ,sum(a.out_content*a.content*0.01) as InFormula ,'ICID' as reference ,b.cas_no ,b.function_cd ,a.item_cd from ( select a.Ingredient_code ,b.item_cd ,b.content ,a.in_content ,a.out_content from tb_new_material_detail a inner join ( select b.new_material_cd as item_cd ,a.content ,a.recipe_id from tb_recipe_detail a inner join tb_new_material_mst b on b.new_material_cd = a.item_cd inner join tb_new_material_detail c on c.new_material_cd = b.new_material_cd where recipe_id = #{recipeId} ) b on a.new_material_cd = b.item_cd ) a inner join tb_ingredient_mst b on b.Ingredient_code = a.Ingredient_code group by b.kr_Ingredient_name ,b.en_Ingredient_name ,b.cn_Ingredient_name ,b.ingredient_code ,b.cas_no ,b.function_cd ,a.item_cd ) a order by a.content desc

select prod_type_Name as prodTypeName ,enProd_type_Name enProdTypeName ,kr_Effect as krEffect ,en_Effect as enEffect ,kr_Usage as krUsage ,en_Usage as enUsage ,kr_Use as krUse ,en_Use as enUse ,kr_Caution as krCaution ,en_Caution as enCaution ,kr_Craftiness as krCraftiness ,en_Craftiness as enCraftiness from tb_product_type where (prod_type_Name = #{prodTypeName} or enProd_type_Name = #{prodTypeName})
